Description_lang: Ignite an ally.If the target dies while affected by Molten Reforge, they explode inflicting $395764s1 Fire damage to all enemies within $395764A1 yards.If Molten Reforge expires, the target is heal for $395765s1.
AuraDescription_lang: This creature will explode on death, dealing $395764s1 Fire damage to enemies within $395764A1 yards.If Molten Reforge expires, heal for $395765s2.
